Package javelin.controller.tournament

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Champion
    Exhibition against a shingle opponent.
    CrIterator
    Picks a random enemy from each available challenge rating.
    Exhibition
    One of the events in a tournament.
    ExhibitionScreen
    TODO this stuff needs to go to JavelinApp.context as a controller hierarchy.
    Horde
    Exhibition against many opponents.
    Match
    Similar to a RandomEncounter but has higher difficulty to compensate for ExhibitionFights not being fatal.
    MirrorMatch
    Fight against your own squad.
